articleContent:
During the event, 5-Star Weapon: Lethean Elegy, 4-Star Weapons: Jinzhou Keeper, Celestial Spiral, and Lunar Cutter receive boosted drop rates!

✦Duration✦
Version 2.5 update - 2025-08-14 09:59 (server time)

✦Eligibility✦
Reach Union Level 8 or complete the combat trial in ""First Resonance"" and activate the Convene function.

✦Convene Rules✦
- [Absolute Pulsation] is a Featured Weapon Convene event banner.
- Use Forging Tide to convene. You are guaranteed at least one 4-Star or higher rarity Resonator or Weapon every 10 attempts.
- The guarantee count is shared among all Featured Weapon Convene events and is carried over until a 5-Star Weapon is obtained.
- The 5-Star Weapon you Convene is guaranteed to be Lethean Elegy.
- Featured Weapon ""Lethean Elegy"" is exclusive to the Featured Weapon Convene and will not be available by other means once the event ends.

※For more details, please refer to the in-game Convene page.
articleTitle: [Absolute Pulsation] Featured Weapon Convene: Boosted Drop Rate for Lethean Elegy
